title: Deli Logo Typeface
content:
Need to recreate this for a local restaurant. (Only the "sayum" portion) Thanks for any help!

Font: 

 fontdinerdotcom

comments.content: **[Fontdinerdotcom](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317120714/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Fontdinerdotcom%20-%20Regular&fid=e4ee657e1462316e49b1d2be6e02ac47&fsize=60&text=saYum&fit=1)** by Stuart Sandler (Font Diner, 2003, Free for personal use) with a modified /Y
